intro: Beilschmiedia barensis, commonly known as the Bornean beilschmiedia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Lauraceae. It is native to the tropical rainforests of Borneo, where it thrives in humid, shaded environments. The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves that are usually elliptical in shape. Beilschmiedia barensis produces small, fragrant flowers that are typically white or pale yellow, followed by dark blue berries. It plays an important ecological role in its habitat, providing food for various wildlife species.
